Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-6119 affecting package cloud-hypervisor-cvm for versions less than 38.0.72.2-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-6119 affecting package cloud-hypervisor-cvm for versions less than 38.0.72.2-3. A patched version of the package is available.
